description: This file defines the main index route component for a personal notes web application using React and Remix. It manages state for notes, searching, modal dialogs, and handles CRUD operations via a notes service. It renders the main UI including navigation, note grid, and modal.

methods.name: Index
methods.description: Main React component for the notes app index route, managing state, effects, and rendering UI.

methods.name: refresh
methods.description: Fetches the list of notes from the service and updates state, handling loading and errors.

methods.name: handleAdd
methods.description: Opens the modal for adding a new note.

methods.name: handleEdit
methods.description: Opens the modal pre-filled with the selected note for editing.

methods.name: handleDelete
methods.description: Deletes a note by id and updates state.

methods.name: handleSubmit
methods.description: Handles submitting new or updated note data to the backend service and updates state accordingly.
